mukhiya.name: mukhiya agni
mukhiya.msg:
@ Mukhiya Agni, scorching flame,
Your fiery spirit ignites our claim.

@ Today, we celebrate your birth,
A beacon of strength, a burning hearth.
May your flames forever shine,
Guiding us through paths benign.
Your leadership, a beacon bright,
A source of power, day and night.
We extend our heartfelt delight,
On this momentous birthday night.

maman-3.name: maman
maman-3.msg:
@ Melody of my heart,

Soft whispers weaving through the air,
A symphony of love, beyond compare.

@ In this tapestry of life's vibrant hue,
Dear Maman, your birthday brings joy anew.
May your laughter echo through the hall,
And your days forever glow with love's thrall.
May your dreams take flight, like doves in the sky,
And your spirit soar, reaching ever high.
Today we celebrate, with hearts full of cheer,
The extraordinary woman you hold dear.
So raise a glass, and let the love resound,
For Maman's birthday, forever profound.

anu-4.name: anu
anu-4.msg:
@ "When the sun is high and the moon is low, it's time to celebrate your special glow."

@ Dear Anu, on this momentous occasion, as you embark on another year of life's grand journey, may your heart brim with joy and your spirit soar to new heights. Your presence in our lives is like a radiant star, illuminating our paths with laughter, love, and unwavering support. May your birthday be a symphony of laughter, love, and cherished memories. As you blow out the candles on your cake, know that you are surrounded by those who love you dearly. May your special day be filled with all the happiness you deserve. Happy birthday, dear Anu!

klsh-5.name: klsh
